name: Infiniwiz
tag_list: internet-service-provider, exchange-email-hosting, hosted-cloud-desktop, hosted-voip, business-voip, hosted-windows-desktop, hosted-business-voip
overview:
Infiniwiz is a trusted provider Of Microsoft Exchange Hosting, Virtual Private Server and VoIP Phone Services For Small To Mid-Sized Businesses and organizations nationwide.

Services offered by Infiniwiz include Hosted Exchange, which provides businesses with access to the security and features of Microsoft Exchange without having a server in-house. Exchange hosting allows company employees to access all of their data from anywhere in the world. Hosted VoIP is another service offered, which enables employees to access phone features from anywhere at anytime through the Internet, mobile phones, or traditional lines. They also provide Hosted Desktop where users can access their virtual desktops from anywhere in the world. In addition, Infiniwiz also offers secure web hosting in which they offer both Linux and Window based services.

Infiniwiz also has partner programs such as a White Label Reseller Program, General Reseller, and Referral Program.
